thread.title: ACA claims hit new Saint Carlisle
thread.title_full: ACA claims hit new Saint Carlisle

title: ACA claims hit new Saint Carlisle
text:
St Kilda recruit Jake Carlisle embroiled in ACA footage claims TOM MINEAR and ALEX WOOD Herald Sun St Kilda recruit Jake Carlisle embroiled in ACA footage claims TOM MINEAR and ALEX WOOD Herald Sun Jake Carlisle accused of snorting powder 1:41 
AFL star Jake Carlisle faces allegations from the Nine Network that he filmed himself snorting white powder. October 22nd 2015 3 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/News/ 
ST KILDA fans have been asked to be patient until all the facts are known about the drug scandal surrounding new recruit Jake Carlisle. 
The Saints had no knowledge of the scandal before completing a trade to bring him to the club. 
A Current Affair has obtained footage showing a man purportedly snorting a line of white powder. 
The brief Snapchat clip, filmed off the screen of a phone, appears to show a man A Current Affair identifies as Carlisle in a dark room. 
His face then moves out of the frame and someone is seen leaning over to snort the powder off a table. Other Stories
